title: Wagaya no Liliana-san The Animation
synopsis: Our protagonist Tatsuya was living a normal life as a video game fanatic and altogether average guy. One day he stumbled upon a dark-skinned beauty being attacked by dogs in an alleyway... One thing leads to another and she ended up living with him as she had nowhere else to go...
related_anime: ['Anette-san to Liliana-san The Animation', 'Wagaya no Liliana-san', 'Tonari no Ie no Anette-san The Animation']
staff: [['Nishikawa, Takashi', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Aoi, Nagisa', ['Original Creator']], ['Horikawa, Kazuto', ['Director of Photography']]]
